programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Sounds of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Day The Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warninf for all mankind. The people of Earth must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: NASA is one step closer to going back to the Moon! However, this Wet Dress Rehearsal was far from perfect. Also, UFO Congressional hearings a rocket with no engines and and details on a World View experience. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: China's LEO and Moon plans continue to come into view. Virgin Galactic has issues, Blue Origin takes off and SpaceX nails the landing. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Solar System: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Fascinating facts, images...and fun with Jordan as we travel through our solar system. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: Space Channel brings you news you need to be aware of, such as the new innovations in space and the potential for conflicts. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: Tensions in LEO continue to escalate as more commercial aerospace companies become unwilling participants in the Russian Special Military Operation. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Elon HELPS!
programme.desc: From water crises, ventilators and cave diving, Elon Musk, founder of Tesla and SpaceX just can't help but help. Duration: 1800

programme.title: First Man into Space
programme.desc: The first pilot to leave Earth's atmosphere lands, then suddenly vanishes. Something with a craving for blood prowls the countryside. Perhaps the two are connected? Of course they are! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200
